language.entry: Heir
Roses Thorn
Protect Me
Bloom
Divine Communion
Roses Embrace
Roses Offering
Roses Vine
Move
Roses Thorn
Protect Me
Bloom
Divine Communion
Roses Embrace
Roses Offering
Roses Vine
Ragged Cloth & Torn Hood
Patched Coat & Hood
Resewn Coat & Hood
Fine Coat & Ceremonial Hood
"Fully Bloomed"
Bound Coat
Hastily Bound Journal
Leather Bound Journal
Refurbished Journal
Ceremonial Journal
"Ancestor's Legacy"
Dark Journal

Born too late to enjoy the family's once plentiful luxury, The Heir was instead raised within a cult. Growing up learning the same research that drove her Ancestor mad, The Heir instead has drawn power from the ancient incantations, deadly to foes and able to provide uncoventional healing to her teammates.

The Heir is wrapped in a light coat, very much unfit for a close battle, but good for speed. Her Journal, scrawlings from her teachings growing up, contains ancient, unspeakable magic, capable of causing horrors to enemies....and herself.

The Heir fears sleep, knowing all too well what lies in the darkness of night. She prefers digging through the writings of the Ancestor, desperate to learn anything that could shine light on the treacherous nature of the dungeon, and how to make use of it.
Protect Me
Bloom
Roses Offering
The Heir's Arrival!
A letter. A journal. A dark curse. The Heir will do her best to help, even if it costs her her life.
A Day of Respite
A desperate need for reprieve has caused The Heir to seek solace amongst The Hamlet's denizens, away from her books for awhile.
ENCOURAGE
Steady your breath, all will be well.
I've struck quite the bargain to keep you here, cheer up.
PEP TALK
Place your hand here, feel my heartbeat? Match it.
Relax, tell me what ails you.
WOUND CARE
I don't like to admit it...But I was very worried for you.
Relax...I will care for you.
CALMING CHANT
The Light touches us even here.
I see victory in your eyes, though you are blind to it.
RESEARCH
I'll stay up and study..The rest of you sleep.
RITUAL
A bloodied kiss to your head will grant you power.
RUMMAGE
Th-there's nothing wrong with me taking something extra, I am the heir!
STUDY
I think my Ancestor left a map of this place..
A reflection? Or a shadow? I cannot walk with this one.
I am no longer a child, I am no longer afraid of you.
Bound and striken, I am six years old again.
I cannot, my body simply will not.
The dark...its too much!
No! Please no more!
What is it that whispers to me?
He...He warned me of all of you!
Betrayal? N-no...It can't be..
Don't stare at me! I cannot handle it!
Strike me! It will not hurt!
Pain is proof I am still alive!
Whatever you do, I have had worse!
Hit me! It makes me grow stronger!
Weak. you are all so weak.
I am nothing, but you lot are worse!
Terrible. You are all simply terrible.
You all disgust me.
This lot, the weakest of all.
I know the true path, only I.
Fools, you are bound to me!
You all belong to me!
Give yourselves over to me!
Whatever we get from this, it goes to me.
All my bottled emotions have finally caught up to me..
Father...where ever did you go? All I wanted was a family..
He took the rings when he left...his, mother's..and mine...
Did anyone in the family ever want me? Does anyone want me now?
The chains rattle! They've returned for me!
My skin crawls. Literally.
So many eyes in the dark. They all watch me.
Golden skulls bear the crown! The crown is my inheritance!
The journal guides me!
The writing reads clear!
The darkness and I are one, it cannot frighten me.
Do not fear the dark, I will be your light.
The Heart beats in tune with my own!
I see it! I understand it!
What is this feeling running through my veins?
He said the rituals would grant me strength. He was right.
Replace me!
The chains did not destroy me. I am unbroken.
Not even the darkest of creatures can stop me.
My book demands I get better.
Yes, yes, I thrive once more.
I am here, none of you need worry.
I came to understand your struggles! Let me be your wall!
I've done a ritual, let me give you the power.
I've heard you're talented. Show me.
We shall not fall!
A prick from the thorns and you all blossom.
I am the blooming rose! Fear my thorns!
I shall not be plucked from the vine!
No...I am wilting...
A lone rose, fearful on its dying bush.
I shall wilt in the dark!
The Heart! It hears me!
My predecessor's voice plagues me!
It lurks beneath my feet, ready to swallow me whole..
Pull at my petals! I deserve it!
With agony, my thorns grow ever sharper!
I do not fear the pruning of the garden!
You all sicken me.
I'm above you!
I'm very disappointed in you all.
Do I not deserve better?
Hush your noises, you break my concentration!
Cease your disgusting squirming!
Why have I been abandoned?
My fortune left me at such a young age..
Mother on the cold floor, her life taken by her own hand!
Father flees in the dark, abandoning his child!
I was only six years old!
The dark overwhelms me!
Away from their grabbing hands!
Get away from me!
Th-they will ruin me if they catch me!
No--No...They plan to do terrible things if they catch me...I know it.
I see the taint within them! Away!
Destroy me, it's all I am good for!
I feel no pain!
Break me! It makes me stronger!
Mother....Father...is that you?
The hallway that leads...it leads...
The swirling black dresses...they're so familiar.
Not another ritual! I'll be good!
Nooo! Not the chains again!
The red light! The eyes! What is that?!
Closer to my fate.
There's no point in struggling..
Why was this meant to be my path?
I am not worthy of leading.
I cannot take the front, I will disappoint you all.
You will do better than me here.
I will lead you all!
Their destruction shall be at my hand!
The gardener must be close to prune the failing flora.
Ah...I must protect myself.
The heir--The heir should be away from the danger!
Excuuuse meee..
I-I'm so frightened...I cannot move!
Entangled. Trapped. Too afraid to move.
I--My body refuses me!
A rose will not be led to its demise so easily!
Fool me not, I shall not let anyone pluck me!
No, I know better for myself.
Hahaha, no one commands me.
I defy this.
It's not time for that!
I have no faith in myself...I'm sorry.
I'm weak...a flower yet to blossom.
The rose is beautiful....yet it dies so easily.
The book told me not to.
The chains keep me from acting!
I cannot, my predecessor would never allow it.
You mean me ill!
I can handle myself!
Hands off! I command myself, thank you!
Hahaha! this is nothing.
Dye this rose red!
I will be the nail in my own coffin!
I will show you how it's done!
Fools, you are all weak!
I will not be commanded by the likes of you lot!
Watch and learn from your leader!
I will not share what I know with you!
No one commands me! I am The Heir!
I am but a weak flower, flung into a wicked breeze.
I am not a worthy successor..
I fail you all...
The windows were red....and then they were not!
So many eyes! What do they want!
It reaches for me! S-Stay back!
It binds...It binds...
The fire is not bright enough, it's too dark!
I've seen my doom..it closes in..
The darkness comes for me!
A coup...I know it..
You are....sitting too close..
Don't stare at me like that, I don't want to imagine what you're thinking.
I've never felt so good!
I hurt, I enjoy, I thrive.
Perhaps agony is my true path...
Step too close and I will strike you.
No more talking. I demand it.
S-Silence, or I'll...I'll have your tongue.
How is it I am the only competent one here?
A blooming rose, standing out amoungst their peers.
Maybe if you hand something of yours to me, I can help you in return.
No...It's useless...it's all useless...
Let it swallow us..we deserve it.
P-please...don't let the fire go out..it's all I have now.
The chains have given me a phantom itch.
The book demands my attention fully.
M-may I borrow your blood for a ritual?
Take me! I am who you want!
If you're looking for who to hit, they're here!
Come then! I will drag you to hell with me!
I will drag you screaming into the dark alongside me!
Rake the dirt around me!
Pull me by the roots! The roots are weak!
You! You traitor!
I know what you're planning!
L-learn from this!
Make no more mistakes!
I--I hurt! Someone must share it!
Take this! Take it from me!
Hurt! Then rise!
BLOOD FOR POWER!
Only a fool hurts themself...and I am such a fool..
Ah...I prick myself on my own thorn..
I will dye myself red!
Bloom...Let me bloom.
Why? What would running do?
No. You will not drag me from this.
I will not run screaming like I did as a child.
Oh please, accept your fate.
If we leave..I may heal.
Pain is all I want, so I stay.
DON'T FLEE NOW!
YOU CAN'T RUN FROM THIS!
H-have I not suffered enough for you...?
I've tried so hard...still I am abused..
You were there...weren't you..?!
Th-this was planned, wasn't it!?
You'll pay for that!
AGH! How dare you?!
Hahaha! That was nothing!
Once more, harder this time.
No! Please, I'll stay near you!
I won't stray again, please no more!
Not me!
No! I am but a delicate rose!
The vermin long to devour the rose from its bush..
So you've come to pluck me, have you?
You missed. Try again, won't you?
Come now, I may be small but surely you can do better than that.
The chanting rings again...rings again..what are they saying, Mother?
Their voices make my head swirl with gore and blood!
That one was mine!
It's not nice to steal from others...
You did good, but I could do better.
Hmmm, you could've done better than that.
I guess I'll be put back on that awful pedestal again...
Darkened room...Harsh words...But it made me see...made me see..
B-but you promised to protect me..!
Truly...we are lost.
T-that...You meant to do that!
My god...you wish to damn us all!
Come now, I could have hit that.
A bound child puts up more of a fight.
Hmmm, gift me, and I shall help your accuracy.
Well...it was a good distraction for me.
What was that you saw? Was it as I see?
Am I bound? Or is it everyone else on the pedestal?
Not this...Anything but this.
Oh no..Oh no...Not them...
You act your part very well, you know.
Wh-why are you letting yourself be hit?!
Don't hurt them! Take me instead!
No! Not them! Me!
Incredible, how easily you botch things.
And here I hoped for more.
Skirts! The masks! Surrounding me! Surrounding me!
I'm sorry--I'm so sorry..
Is it over for us?
Ah...but I did not write a will for myself.
You did that on purpose, did you not?!
You damn us on your own accord!
It will come for us all eventually...you hasten it.
Return....Return...Return..
No...I'm being led into the dark...
Ah...no...not that..
Watch your hands!
Bold of me to even think of moving.
I will not run from this.
You can't!
Y-you are unworthy to touch me!
No...No...No...No..
Too close...Too close..
No! It's all poisoned!
You wish to bind me?!
No! I'm used to this.
Endurance is my only strength.
I don't want to burden you..
No...if I can't do it myself, I deserve the pain.
I can't---it writhes on me.
What is that? WHAT IS THAT?!
Is this how it means to get me? Away with you!
I don't need your help!
I know you mean to harm me!
I must bear this burden!
Only touch me if you mean to tear me open!
Let me suffer! I deserve it!
Not me, I don't deserve it.
Save yourselves..
The windows showed me the truth...I know it..
Let the chains constrict me!
My eyes...what do you want with them?
You seek to taint me!
Do-Don't touch me!
You deny me this?
I am fine as I am! Get away!
I do not need your help!
Empty...you long to bless an empty husk..
Don't touch me, I cannot take it.
I am a wretched thing, do not waste your time.
SSSSSHHH! Stay close, girl! Do not anger your grandfather!
The hallway is too dark, I grip her hand tighter.
I don't understand what you want!
Cut from the bush!
I--I did that? I really did that?
Haha! I got one!
I purge you from my sight!
There is no room for rotten flowers!
Spurned by my thorns!
(gasp) What horror!
My...My predecessor caused this?
H-how horrible!
Fear not, all is calm...we are safe here.
Do you need me to sit closer to you? Will it ease you?
They made me learn how to stitch...Let me help you.
I--I was worried you would not make it...
Recover quick, we need you.
You strike true, you're remarkable!
There's a fire within you, let it burn through your soul.
Th-this book I've found....it-it's so embarrassing...
In my spare time, I read romance novels...What of it?
Your threads are torn, let me patch them.
It calls for me, again..
My hands shake too much...I cannot spill the blood needed.
It eats away at me and denies me the power!
I am but a helpless child again...
Oh no, do not step closer to me!
That--That look in your eyes...What does it mean?
Don't stare! You're making me nervous!
I only want agony, and yet I am denied.
I am merely its puppet, made to feel pain.
All I've known is isolation and agony.
Aren't I above this?
You are all covered in blood and dirt, I shall not touch you.
Why share power with this fools?
Ahah...as if.
The power is my burden alone! It belongs to me!
He said I was not worthy of anything more than the rituals...
I do not deserve your kindness.
They kept me bound for so long...
My eyes were brown once...now they are not.
I cannot cast on writhing flesh.
INVALID
INVALID
Do not sit so close to me!
I shall hold the hot iron in my hands. It feels incredible.
I want to suffer in peace.
Hush your horrible noises!
You are annoying me.
INVALID
INVALID
It all hurts to much...I can't...
Why...Why did it choose me?
The ritual's marks wind up my sides, you have to wait until they stop.
Tell your extra eyes to stop looking at me.
I refuse. I know what becomes of those who hold positions.
Does this smell off to you?
Let me hunger. It feels right.
I'm not hungry, the rest of you feast.
Unwanted...I do not deserve food.
No please....I just want to be alone..
What? You mean to feed me rat?
It's all flesh, I shall not eat.
